commands.exec: export PGO_OPERATOR_NAMESPACE=pgo && kubectl create namespace pgo
git clone -b sample-app https://github.com/operator-playground/postgres-operator && cd postgres-operator && kubectl create -f postgre.yaml && kubectl create -f secret.yaml
export ip_addr=$(ifconfig eth1 | grep inet | awk '{print $2}' | cut -f2 -d:)
curl -o service.yaml https://raw.githubusercontent.com/operator-playground/postgres-operator/sample-app/service.yaml && kubectl create -f service.yaml -n pgo

commands.description: Wait for Postgres Operator to spin up
commands.exec: until nc -z -v -w30 $ip_addr 32443; do echo "Waiting for database connection..."; sleep 5; done;
